dialogue.speaker: Professor Finn
dialogue.line: What a convenient device you have!

dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: Yes, this device can collect garbage like a magnet.

dialogue.speaker: Professor Finn
dialogue.line: Finally, someone saves the sea from the devastating effect of the garbage in the sea.

dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: I also think that. But sorry, we are in a little hurry as we have to find parts of the ship of my partner.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: Wait Zed! He might have a clue of where we might find some parts.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: Mister, did you see any object that is like part of a spaceship?

dialogue.speaker: Professor Finn
dialogue.line: I donâ€™t have a problem giving you information, but can you do some favor for me? Can you two collect '25' Garbage for me.

dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: No problem. So did you see any object that is like part of a spaceship?

dialogue.speaker: Professor Finn
dialogue.line: Nothing in particular, but I did see a beautiful meteor shower falling in the sky.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: Can you tell me the trajectory of the meteors?

dialogue.speaker: Professor Finn
dialogue.line: If you keep traversing this path, you might eventually find the crash point of one meteor. But for the others, I am not sure.
